title: Til Sölu Redsound Soundbite XL (DJ Sampler & Filter)
text:
Til Sölu Redsound Soundbite XL (DJ Sampler & Filter)
•	Featuring Red Sound's acclaimed V3 BPM engine, SoundBITE XL automatically creates seamless loop samples that cycle continuously in synchronisation with each other and the music source.
•	AUTOMATIC LOOP SAMPLES
•	- create perfect loops at the touch of a button!
•	LOOPS UP TO 32 BEATS LONG
•	- wide range of loop lengths, from 1/4 beat right up to 32 beats!
•	ANALOG STYLE FX
•	- apply cool filter effects to the loop output or audio input in real-time!
•	Offering state-of-the-art BPM detection for perfect loop samples at the touch of a button, SoundBITE XL creates the loops seamlessly and automatically syncs them to your main mix tempo.
•	This easy to use, affordable module includes additional features for creative mixing, including a jog wheel for applying analog style filter effects and selectable reverse loop playback.
•	The SoundBITE XL is easy to install and comes with all the hardware needed to connect it to your existing DJ rig!
Links:
http://www.redsound.com/products/SoundBITEXL
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NIZpNhghSgI&feature=related
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvjcXabi2u8&feature=related
Frábært DJ sampler, virkar með öllum mixers. Original kassi og allar snúru er með.
Hefur svínvirkar með Allen & Heath - Xone 92  mixer sem ég á. Er mjög fljótur að lesa tempo. Toppstandi
Verð 17.000 kr
Rikki
S:8202714
